meanings.definition: Not conforming to established customs or rules.
meanings.sent1: Her unconventional outfit was quite unconformable at the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The unconformable behavior of the rebellious teenager caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent3: It was unconformable but hilarious when the dog tried to wear a hat.
meanings.sent4: The artist's unconformable style challenged traditional norms in a bold way.
meanings.sent5: The unconformable decision to paint the house neon green made it stand out in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Not in agreement or harmony with something else.
meanings.sent1: The two pieces of the puzzle were unconformable and didn't fit together.
meanings.sent2: Their unconformable opinions on the matter led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent3: It was unconformable but amusing when the cat and dog argued over a toy.
meanings.sent4: The unconformable relationship between the siblings was like oil and water.
meanings.sent5: The unconformable colors clashed in the painting, creating a jarring effect.
